backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining design tokens, theme variables, and dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and script to load the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages in the AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing navy background and heart animation with centered content.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glass‑style card component supporting extra HTML div attributes.
frontend/src/components/HeartsBackground: Generates floating and falling animated blue heart elements across the viewport.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Simple wrapper applying a fade‑in animation to page content.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryButton.ts: Styled primary/secondary button component with glow and hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles with extended Valentine blue theme, utilities, and glow effects.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ForeverPage.tsx: Displays a romantic 'Forever' page with glowing heart visuals, messages, and animated floating hearts.
frontend/src/pages/GiftsHubPage.tsx: Shows a hub of gift options linking to quiz, letter, and gallery pages, with a button leading to the Forever page.
frontend/src/pages/LoveLetterPage.tsx: Provides a love letter viewer and editor with localStorage persistence and edit/save/cancel functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LoveQuizPage.tsx: Implements an interactive multi-question love quiz with navigation, scoring, and result messages.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoGalleryPage.tsx: Manages a customizable photo gallery with upload, captions, editing, reset options, and localStorage storage.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Shows a playful Valentine proposal with an enlarging Yes button and an evasive No button leading to a success page.
frontend/src/pages/TransitionPage.tsx: Displays a brief transition screen before auto-navigating to the gifts page.
frontend/src/utils/imageToBase64.ts: Converts image files to base64 strings with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/localStorage.ts: Provides safe wrapper functions for reading and writing JSON data to localStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color palette, container settings, animations, and extended theme utilities for a navy/blue visual style.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, feature list, architecture notes, and visual/functional requirements for a multi-page Valentine-themed website.
